YES, I AM CERTAIN I WOULD WANT TO   2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT I,M NOT SURE   3. NO, I DON,T THINK I WOULD WANT TO   4. NO, I AM CERTAIN I WOULD NOT WANT TO   0. NO ANSWER F. HERE IS A LITTLE QUIZ TO SEE HOW MUCH A REPRESENTATIVE GROUP OF G.I.,S HAVE BEEN INFORMED ABOUT THIS CONFERENCE. READ EACH STATEMENT CAREFULLY AND THEN PUT A CHECK-MARK IN FRONT OF THE ANSWER THAT YOU THINK MAKES THE STATEMENT TRUE. ALWAYS READ ALL OF THE ANSWERS AND CHECK THE CORRECT ANSWER. IF YOU DO NOT KNOW THE ANSWER TO A QUESTION, CHECK ONE OF THE ANSWERS ANYWAY - JUST MAKE THE BEST GUESS YOU CAN.
